dataValueTemplate.annotation: SELECT ifnull(AVG(list.at),0) FROM ( SELECT cb.patient_id,sum(cbp.amount_tendered) as at FROM openmrs.cashier_bill_payment cbp,openmrs.cashier_bill cb where cbp.bill_id = cb.bill_id and cbp.voided = 0 and DATE(cbp.date_created) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(cbp.date_created) < :endOfPeriod and cb.location_id = :locationId group by cb.patient_id ) as list

SELECT ifnull(AVG(list.at),0) FROM ( SELECT cbli.bill_id,sum(cbli.price) as at FROM openmrs.cashier_bill_line_item cbli,openmrs.cashier_bill cb where cbli.bill_id = cb.bill_id and cb.voided = 0 and cb.status in('PAID','POSTED','OVERPAID') and DATE(cbli.date_created) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(cbli.date_created) < :endOfPeriod and cb.location_id = :locationId group by cbli.bill_id ) as list
